"A.D.2028/3/24": "Haaaaah... Aahhhh... It's been a while since I walked this much."
"Like I said, go back to your room."
"Hitsugi, since a certain friend told me to go shopping for them, I think it's fair for me to indulge myself for a bit."
"Hey, Aru. Come and sleep with me. Hitsugi's bed is soo soft and fluffy."
"I know right. I've also slept there."
"You've... slept... here!? W-wait a minute Hitsugi! What did he mean by that!"
"Get your head out the gutter! Aru appeared on the bed without me even noticing."
"So that means... Hitsugi and Aru's scent is mixed in this bed."
"And now, on top of that is my scent. What a miracle fusion!"
"You're creeping me out, so stop it."
"...Now that I think of it, I'm sweating quite a bit."
"It's quite humid in here too. Aru's sweaty too, aren't you?"
"...I feel a bit stuffy now."
"Alright, since it's good timing, let's head to the bath before the others arrive. We went through a lot buying those clothes, after all."
"W-wait a minute Hitsugi."
"What?"
"What are we going to do with Aru?"
"Umm... Should we skip the next recorded scene? What do you say?"
"1. Peeping is bad."
"2. Data collection is vital."
"W-we're not peeping at all! This is for collecting good, honest data!"
"We are doing nothing wrong! There's nothing to be guilty about... It's work! Yeah, that's what it is."
"...But, that said, you would still watch it with me right, <%me>? How devious of you."
"S-such bold words!"
"...I understand! If <%me> is really prepared for it, I'll fully cooperate with you!"
"...But, that said, you would still watch it with me right, <%me>? How devious of you."
